queries.query: SELECT sum("cpu_usage_nanocores")/1000000000 AS "cpu_usage" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND ("host"='ip-172-32-50-151.ec2.internal' OR "host"='ip-172-32-53-177.ec2.internal' OR "host"='ip-172-32-53-94.ec2.internal') GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("network_rx_bytes"))/1000000 AS "Recieved", non_negative_derivative(sum("network_tx_bytes"))/1000000 AS "sent" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND ("host"='ip-172-32-50-151.ec2.internal' OR "host"='ip-172-32-53-177.ec2.internal' OR "host"='ip-172-32-53-94.ec2.internal') GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)
